item.title: Redis
item.description: New to KubeDB? Please start here. Supported Redis Features Features Availability Clustering ✗ Instant Backup ✗ Scheduled Backup ✗ Persistent Volume ✓ Initialize using Snapshot ✗ Initialize using Script ✗ Custom Configuration ✓ Using Custom docker image ✓ Builtin Prometheus Discovery ✓ Using CoreOS Prometheus Operator ✓
